attributes.action: Approach the Queen to sack ALL MP's who have not claime expenses according to the spirit of the agreement and ask her to remove any honors or peerages they hold
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: sack ALL MP's who have not claime expenses according to the spirit of the agreement and prosecute all who have broken the law and remove any honors or peerages they hold

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
